Description: 
Caligo is a small, atmospheric walk simulator and an interactive story in which you will first have to look and listen. Caligo is the darkness in which, one way or another, everyone descends, and everyone sees in it something of their own. For someone, this is a small exciting adventure, for someone it's a place where you can relax, for someone a reminder of his nightmare, and for someone, maybe it's a real revelation. But one thing is for everyone, everyone should answer one single, main question.
